data.comment: The match has started at Giuseppe Meazza.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
Atalanta are pushing forward but Marten De Roon's finish is wide of the goal.
Daniele Doveri awards Milan a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Atalanta are caught offside.
Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 7, Atalanta's Duvan Zapata attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Milan goal kick.
Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, Papu Gomez of Atalanta gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Milan.
Throw-in for Milan close to the penalty box.
In the minute 9, Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Atalanta.
Throw-in Milan.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
In the minute 11, Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atalanta needs to be cautious. Milan have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 13, Can Milan capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Hakan Calhanoglu puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Can Milan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atalanta's half?
In the minute 17, Milan drive upfield and Lucas Biglia gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atalanta defender.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Daniele Doveri awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Diego Laxalt (Milan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
In the minute 20, Milan have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Atalanta in the half of Milan.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 22, Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Atalanta in Milan.
Milan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 23, Play has been interrupted briefly in Milan to check on Ruslan Malinovskyi, who is grimacing with pain.
Atalanta have been given a penalty at Giuseppe Meazza...
At Giuseppe Meazza, Lucas Biglia has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 26, Ruslan Malinovskyi for Atalanta is back on the field again.
Atalanta were awarded a penalty ... Which Ruslan Malinovskyi failed to convert!
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Ante Rebic's header is off-target for Milan.
Atalanta have a goal kick.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 31, In Milan Milan's Hakan Calhanoglu is caught offside.
Daniele Doveri signals a Milan throw-in in Atalanta's half.
Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 33, Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
Goal! Duvan Zapata levels the match at 1-1.
Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 36, Atalanta's Rafael Toloi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Milan defender.
Atalanta to take a throw-in in Milan territory.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
In the minute 38, Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rafael Toloi (Atalanta) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in Milan.
Throw-in for Milan in the half of Atalanta.
Milan's Zlatan Ibrahimovic is whistled for offside at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Giuseppe Meazza.
Ruslan Malinovskyi of Atalanta is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Remo Freuler gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atalanta.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Gian Piero Gasperini (Atalanta) is making a first substitution, with Bosko Sutalo replacing Rafael Toloi.
Free kick Atalanta.
In the minute 47, Daniele Doveri signals a throw-in for Atalanta, close to Milan's area.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Daniele Doveri awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Milan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Milan.
Milan needs to be cautious. Atalanta have an attacking throw-in.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Milan in the half of Atalanta.
Marten De Roon (Atalanta) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
In the minute 54, Throw-in Milan.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Giuseppe Meazza.
Milan push forward at Giuseppe Meazza and Hakan Calhanoglu gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atalanta defence.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
Can Atalanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Milan's half?
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Luis Muriel is on a sub for Ruslan Malinovskyi for Atalanta.
Throw-in high up the field for Atalanta in Milan.
Atalanta's Papu Gomez breaks free at Giuseppe Meazza. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 59, Goal kick for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
The home team have replaced Lucas Biglia with Giacomo Bonaventura. This is the first substitution made today by Stefano Pioli.
In the minute 61, Rade Krunic is replacing Hakan Calhanoglu for the home team.
The home team replace Ante Rebic with Rafael Leao.
Daniele Doveri awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 63, Can Atalanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Milan's half?
Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
Hans Hateboer (Atalanta) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
In the minute 69, Atalanta are coming forward and Marten De Roon gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
Atalanta make their third substitution with Timothy Castagne replacing Robin Gosens.
In the minute 69, Mario Pasalic is replacing Remo Freuler for Atalanta at Giuseppe Meazza.
Stefano Pioli is making the team's fourth substitution at Giuseppe Meazza with Samu Castillejo replacing Alexis Saelemaekers.
Atalanta to take a throw-in in Milan territory.
In the minute 72, Important block from the Milan defence as Duvan Zapata fires in a strike for Atalanta.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
In Milan, Marten De Roon of Atalanta is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 73, So close for Milan as Giacomo Bonaventura's shot comes back off the post.
Corner awarded to Milan.
Milan's Samu Castillejo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Atalanta goal kick.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Milan's Franck Kessie misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 77, Daniele Doveri awards Atalanta a goal kick.
Daniele Doveri awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Atalanta.
In the minute 80, Milan have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
Atalanta have a goal kick.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Atalanta.
In the minute 81, Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniele Doveri signals a throw-in for Milan, close to Atalanta's area.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Marten De Roon is back on the pitch.
In the minute 83, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Marten De Roon.
Daniele Doveri signals a Milan throw-in in Atalanta's half.
In the minute 87, Atalanta drive forward but Papu Gomez is judged offside.
Atalanta's Luis Muriel gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Milan defender.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Milan close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Giuseppe Meazza.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Franck Kessie of Milan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Atalanta have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Atalanta have a dangerous throw-in.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atalanta close to the penalty box.
Luis Muriel (Atalanta) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
Daniele Doveri blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Ebrima Colley is replacing Papu Gomez for Atalanta at Giuseppe Meazza.
